name: Bobbly-Wobbly Water Donut
description: A swim ring that can be hung on the wall, it is made of light and sturdy fabric. Commonly found near water bodies in Natlan, the "Bobbly-Wobbly Water Donut," known for its light blue graffiti designs, is said to calm the mind, allowing one to frolic in the waves as carefree as a Flowcurrent Bird.\nIf a budding photographer could only persuade a Flowcurrent Bird to put on this swim ring, just imagine how serenely leisurely the scene before them might hypothetically be...
